summary: The client requested a re-run of Sprint 1 (SP-001), and Mike, the Sprint Planning Architect, confirmed the sprint details including user stories US-001, US-010, and US-015, and offered to execute the re-run via the backend pending client confirmation.

actions.task: Execute re-run of Sprint SP-001 upon client confirmation
Confirm re-run by saying 'yes' or 'start execution' or suggest adjustments to stories

risks.risk: Previous sprint execution may have hit a snag requiring validation
risks.mitigation: Re-run the sprint to regenerate code, tests, and integrations based on acceptance criteria
